newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak FinMin 41-wk T-bill avg yield 11.94 pct.
newsitem.headline: Slovak FinMin 41-wk T-bill avg yield 11.94 pct.

text.p: The average yield at the Slovak Finance Ministry's auction of 41-week treasury bills rose to 11.94 percent from 11.25 percent in the last auction of T-bills with a similar maturity, the central bank said on Wednesday.
It said all 1.095 billion crowns worth of bids at the ministry's three-week T-bill auction were rejected. The ministry does not announce the amount of bills on offer at its auctions.
